title: How can I help???
comment: Great starter app. I like it, how can I contribute to the cause???
It depends what your skills are :-) write to our Google group kontalk-devel@googlegroups.com

title: Safe and secure alternative to WhatsApp!
comment: slim, secure instant messenger for sending pictures and chats one-to-one

title: Unable to receive verification code
comment: Well I recently installed this app and em unable to receive the verification code in Karachi Pakistan ! Is your service available in Pakistan?
Please try again with beta version.

title: Great
comment: The best open source chat app based on XMPP protocol. Please keep going on developing this awesome project.         -the messages I received is always "(encrypted)"

title: Almost excellent
comment: How do i change profile picture
I'm sorry this feature is not available yet.
This is a great app.. good job dev team,

title: the worst
comment: not able to import any of my contacts this is the worst app I have ever encountered on google play
MISSFOXY415

title: About time!
comment: This is one of the slickest looking opensource clients available for android. Love to see this project taking off.

title: Send on enter would make this perfect
comment: The only feature I'm missing is "send on enter". Also it would be great if there were more emoticons & the emoticon selector be on the left side of the typing bar for easier access. Thank you.
Those features are planned for version 3.0. Thanks for your review.

title: a very good start!
comment: great app, could replace whatsapp eventually. I hope more developers join efforts to have a crossplatform whatsapp replacement with better privacy.

title: Not able to apply verification code
comment: I received a verification code that starts with "MOBILE..." which I can't key in with the dialer keypad. I tried just pressing the keys with the letters on them but that didn't work. Can you keep them to just the digits and *, # etc.? i.e. something that can actually be typed in the verification code entry page?
Those are not our codes... please contact us via e-mail.

title: Ummmuah
comment: Excellent

title: Great
comment: I like it

title: Great potential
comment: Along with surespot this is probably the most secure messenger. Open souce? Yes! End-to-end encrypted? Tick! Noncommercial? You bet!

title: Very good.
comment: Deleting whatsapp.

title: Next whatsapp
comment: This is a very gud app i like its go offline and hide presence feature but the developer should work on the other features like other media plugins and add themes also....   I m sure this app will going to be the best i will tell to my friends about this app..

title: Great effort!
comment: Can see the effort going into the code! Hope to see a lot of fixes in the next version, along with XMPP! Looking forward to it! Kudos!

title: good..
comment: its better in privacy..

title: Good effort
comment: In par with whatsapp and better in privacy.

title: Ok
comment: Awesome download this app I recomend

title: Finally privacy and funcionality in a chat app
comment: P2P open source with proper functionality. Just groups and extra attachments missing.

title: New startup
comment: Nice attempt

title: Chat
comment: Open source chat program not unlike whatapp but totally free forever

title: Freedom & Privacy Protected
comment: Great App, Free software replacement for whatsapp.

title: Kontakte ganz automatisch verknüpft
comment: Top! Super einfach zu bedienende Alternative zu WhatsApp. Und das Beste, Kontalk ist Open Source!  Top! Super user friendly alternative to WhatsApp. Best of all, Kontalk is open source.

title: Genial
comment: Aunque por el momento sea sencillo comparado con otros servicios, sin duda, tiene futuro. Lo mejor es que es open source, descentralizado y privado. Esperemos que se popularice.  Por el momento se pueden mejorar las conversaciones (agrupando los mensajes que envía uno mismo seguidos), chats grupales y más elementos para compartir (como la ubicación).   Muchas gracias por el esfuerzo de los developers
V

title: Awesome stuff
comment: It works without a hitch and does what it is suppose to. What else is there to say?

title: Whatsup replacement
comment: Really secure, free software and no adverts  Community driven
